Pre-Game Insights: Brandon Miller was the second pick in the 2023 NBA Draft to Charlotte, and he could've gone number one if not for Victor Wembanyama.
Post-Match Reflections: After the Hornets home victory, in which Brandon Miller was a neutral plus/minus when on the floor, he met up with fellow Charlotte sports star Bryce Young.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both players are in their second years in their respective leagues, although Young just concluded his second season with the Panthers.
